thread.title: Scuba
thread.title_full: ERIK'S Bike - Board - Ski reviewed by Scuba

author: Scuba
title: Scuba
text: Sent wrong color board, top and bottom of snowboard in pic was black and black bottom. Board I received was blue and white bottom. Geoff blames GNU for giving them the wrong pic. If your gonna sell online you have to send what is shown in the photo or have a large disclaimer. Now I'm mad my bindings don't match my board and the snobs at Grizzlies will laugh while they sip their whipped top White Russians
